name: EUROPE'S SHORTEST BOEING 787 FLIGHT! Business Class from Edinburgh to Dublin!
description:
I flew Business Class on a Hainan Airlines Boeing 787 for Europe's shortest Boeing 787 flight - a 40 minute flight from Edinburgh to Dublin!  What's it lke flying Business Class for such a short flight?
